questions.question_text: A developer wants a new data table, dt_Result, that is only populated with common rows found in two data tables, dt_PreviousEmployees and dt_NewEmployees. Which activity should be used to perform this operation?
By default, which arguments are available and should remain in the Global Exception Handler?

choices.D:
errorinfo with the "In" direction
result with the "In/Out" direction
choices.C:
errorinfo with the "In" direction
result with the "Out" direction
choices.A:
errorinfo with the "In" direction
result with the "In" direction
choices.B:
errorinfo with the "Out" direction
result with the "In/Out" direction

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
errorinfo has in direction and result has out direction.
found the same in UiPath documentation.
so Correct option should be C.

Selected Answer: C
C is correct

Selected Answer: A
While creating an argument in UiPath Studio Name, Direction and Argument type are auto populated so Default value can be considered as an optional field hence can be left blank.
So correct option should be A.
Only the "Default Value" field is optional. All others are required to be populated.

questions.question_text: When creating a new argument, which argument property can be left blank?
When a UiPath project is started with Run mode, what happens when there is a breakpoint on an activity?

discussion.content: the answer should be C, the project is started at Run mode, so the process will not be impacted.

Selected Answer: C
I tested C is the answer

choices.D: Project throws an error when it reaches the activity
choices.C: Project executes without pausing at the activity
choices.A: Project pauses for 5 seconds when it reaches the activity
choices.B: Project pauses at the activity until the Continue button is clicked

questions.question_text: By default, in which activity can a developer add a UI activity that has a full selector?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
I doubt the option as B because Attach window, Attach browser and Open Application are containers which are used to enclose the activities related to the Partial selectors.
So correct option should be C i.e Sequence.
